ygData.subject: Missing Songs (was: Philosophy behind the bard class)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Heh heh.  I had this idea too, though I had forgotten the old AD&D spell. What I was thinking could best be summed up in two words - words that I think
ygData.messageBody:
> Date: Wed, 17 Nov 1999 07:16:00 PST
> From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>
>Subject: RE: Philosophy behind the Bard class
>
>One song I have always thought would be fun is a song with effects similiar
>to the AD&D spell confusion. What this spell did was cause a monster to
>either: frenzy on the nearest player/NPC, frenzy on the nearest NPC, stand
>around looking confused, wander off and forget about the party, no effect
>at all. Not the greatest combat song but it would be great for dispersing
>trains :)
>
>Rokenn

Heh heh. I had this idea too, though I had forgotten the old AD&D spell.
What I was thinking could best be summed up in two words - words that I
think both explain the effects of and justify the existence of the song:

MOSH PIT!!!!

Aloro Silvertongue (E'ci)
p.s. Angstlich's Frenzied Frolic? Jaxon's Energetic Jam? Still trying to
find a good name for it...
